member.name: M:MagNote.Module1.LockMe
member.summary: Call LockWorkStation here or perhaps in a button click event

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the value from an attribute at the specified node.
The XmlNode from which this method will get the value of an attribute. Name of the attribute that will be read. Attribute value read by this method True if node is found and value is retrieved successfully. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the value from an attribute at the specified node.
The XmlNode from which this method will get the value of an attribute. Name of the attribute that will be read. Attribute value read by this method True if success. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets the value from an attribute at the specified node.
The XmlNode from which this method will get the value of an attribute. Name of the attribute that will be read. Attribute value read by this method True if success. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sets the value of an attribute for a given XmlNode.
XmlNode whose attribute will be set. Name of the attribute to set. Value to be set True if success. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sets the value of an attribute for a given XmlNode.
XmlNode whose attribute will be set. Name of the attribute to set. Value to be set True if success. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sets the value of an attribute for a given XmlNode.
XmlNode whose attribute will be set. Name of the attribute to set. Value to be set True if success. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates the child nodes of "parentNode" by using the fields from a datatable.
The child nodes that will be updated must have attribute fields that correspond to the DataTable. The "keyField" will be used to identify the attribute that serves as an identifier of the rows. The datatable can have less fields than the nodes so you have the chance to update smaller subsets. Make sure that you did not call "AcceptChanges" before passing the datatable or this function will not find any change.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns contents of an XmlNode in a string.
The XmlNode whose contents will be read into a string. Xml formatted string with contents of "node" parameter. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Inserts an empty record at the bottom of the hierarchy, creating the tree as required.
member.param: The XmlDocument to which the node will be inserted.
The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
member.returns: The XmlNode inserted into the hierarchy.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Inserts an record with a multiple fields at the bottom of the hierarchy.
member.param: The XmlDocument to which the node will be inserted.
The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
The attribute names that will be created for the node inserted.
The corresponding value of each field.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Inserts a record with a single field at the bottom of the hierarchy.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
The field to add to the record.
The value assigned to the field.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Insert a record with multiple fields at the bottom of the hierarchy.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
The array of fields as field/value pairs.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.Data.DataRow)
member.summary: Inserts a record with multiple fields at bottom of the hierarchy.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
The DataRow values that will be added as attributes.
member.remarks: The columns names of the DataRow will become the attribute names and the row values of the DataRow will be the attribute values. The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Inserts a record with multiple fields from a DataTable at bottom of the hierarchy.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
The DataRow values that will be added as attributes.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Insert(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Inserts a record with multiple values at bottom of hierarchy. This is analogous to inserting a column of data.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
Name of the attribute to be created at node inserted.
Values that will be inserted that correspond to the field name.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to insert an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Update(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Update a single field in all records in the specified path.
member.param: The XmlDocument whose node will be udpated.
The xml path.
The field name to update.
The new value.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: The "doc" variable must have a root node. The path should not contain the root node. The path can contain only the node names or it can contain attributes in XPath query form. For example to update an "Address" node at the bottom, the following is a valid xpath query xpath = "University[@Name='UT']/Student[@Id=12222]/Address"

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Delete(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes all records of the specified path.
member.param: The xml XPath query to get to the bottom node.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: Additional exceptions may be thrown by the XmlDocument class.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Delete(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a field from all records on the specified path.
member.param: The xml path.
The field to delete.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: Additional exceptions may be thrown by the XmlDocument class.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.QueryScalar(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return a single string representing the value of the specified field for the first record encountered.
member.param: The xml path.
The desired field.
member.returns: A string with the field's value or null.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: Additional exceptions may be thrown by the XmlDocument class.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.Query(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a DataTable for all rows on the path.
member.param: The xml path.
member.returns: The DataTable with the returned rows. The row count will be 0 if no rows returned.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: Additional exceptions may be thrown by the XmlDocument class.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.QueryField(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an array of values for the specified field for all rows on the path.
member.param: The xml path.
The desired field.
member.returns: The array of string values for each row qualified by the path. A null is returned if the query results in 0 rows.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is null.
member.remarks: Additional exceptions may be thrown by the XmlDocument class.

member.name: M:MagNote.XmlHelper.InsertNode(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a node at the specified segment if it doesn't exist, otherwise traverses the node.
member.param: The current node.
The path segment list.
The current segment.

member.summary: Creates columns given an XmlNode.
member.param: The target DataTable.
The source XmlNode.
